de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.lexer
Class TMQLLexer

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.lexer.TMQLLexer
All Implemented Interfaces:
ILexer
public class TMQLLexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements ILexer

Base implementation of a lexical scanner for the TMQL query language.

Author:
Sven Krosse

execute

public void execute()
             throws TMQLLexerException
Start the lexical scanner and split the given TMQL query to a list of specific and string-represented tokens. The lexical scanning will be split into to parts. At first the lexical scanner split the query to a list of string-represented tokens which will be transformed to language-specific tokens at the second step.

Specified by:
execute in interface ILexer
Throws:
TMQLLexerException - thrown if the lexical scanning fails

clear

public void clear()
Method to reset the results of lexical scanning.

Specified by:
getQuery in interface ILexer
Returns:
the reference of the query
